评论概述: Beautiful Necklace - Good Value for the Price
评论详情: 1. Shipping: I have Prime shipping. I ordered this on March 8th and received it on March 12th. This is a very good shipping time, considering that it was likely shipping from Asia.  2. Appearance: The pendant of the necklace is shiny, glassy, and well-made. It is a medium-large size, and the image can be slightly hard to make out from afar, due to the small details. It is beautiful, nonetheless. The scrollwork surrounding the glass of the pendant is plastic. It came with two cords to string the pendant on- one a faux leather, and the other a black chain. I've elected to keep the black chain in case I find a new loose pendant. One minor detractor is that as pictured, there is a white paper disc inset into the back of the pendant. I wish this was painted black to not take away from the beauty of the pendant. I will likely colour it in so it distracts me less, but this is very minor, so I take off no stars.  3. Craftsmanship: The pendant itself seems very well made, and sturdy, but I worry the clasp of the PU leather chain will fail on me eventually, as it seems hastily attached.  Overall, I rate this 5 stars due to how quickly I got it, the craftsmanship, and the appearance. I would purchase from this brand for costume jewellery again. My only true con is the white paper disc inset into the back of the pendant, but this is not visible when worn and is a minor flaw. I hope the clasp does not break soon. I paid $8.99.
